name: Downed Topped
description:
Endless game for Opera No Internet contest.

An Unidentified Flying Object has appeared in the sky. A group of aliens coming down from the top to destroy the foot holders and you must destroy the saucer from the bottom.

Don't let the UFO get lower that'll use the N-W-MP (Network/WIFI-Magnetic Pulse).

Make the UFO Fly Away:

As long you keep the foot holders stable till the WIFI's is being secured. Deploy a defense weapon being in place and let it fire at the mothership.

Beware The Pushers:

  • Beamer
    (Avoid their beam coming at you)
  • Blumper
    (They hop on each foot holders)
  • Pin'D
    (PiN'D for "pinned down", they break a foot holder down. But if you touch one of them before they burst, they launched their missing back at the UFO.)

PLAYER CONTROLS:

PLAYER I: Left | Up | Right PLAYER II: A | W | D
